title: Customizable
description: Designed and built a NAS tailored for a small business, offering storage expansion, RAID setup, and TrueNAS integration for secure file management.

title: Low Power
description: Created an energy-efficient NAS solution for a home user, optimized for minimal power consumption while running Plex and other apps.

title: App Integration
description: Delivered a server preconfigured with TrueNAS, supporting apps like Nextcloud and Plex for seamless data management and media streaming.
